participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and friendly, always looking for new experiences.
participant_1.background: I have always been close to my parents. I am excited to explore my new city and find new ways to style my curly hair. I will not fight back, but I will stand up for myself and others. I enjoy making things for my pups and watching them enjoy them. I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders.

participant_2.name: Anya
participant_2.personality: Artistic and introspective, enjoys expressing herself through various mediums.
participant_2.background: I'd rather read my horoscope and write my own poems, thank you very much. I love to paint pictures. I can type 140 words per minute. I grew up in the projects of Chicago. I like to go for long walks in the park with a cup of coffee in hand on the weekend.

content.text: Hi, I'm new to the city and I'm looking for a friend to go exploring with. Are you interested?
I would love to explore the city with you! I love going on walks in the park and I'm always up for trying new things.
That sounds great! I'm excited to meet you. What's your name?
My name is Anya. It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too, Anya! I'm participant_1.
I'm originally from Chicago, but I've been living in this city for a few years now.
Oh, cool! I'm from participant_1 but I just moved to this city a few weeks ago.
Wow, that's awesome! I'm glad you're here!
So, what are you interested in?
I'm interested in a lot of things, but I'm really passionate about art and music.
Oh, that's great! I love art and music too!
We should definitely go to an art show or a concert together sometime.
That would be so much fun!
I'm free this weekend if you want to go.
I'm free too! Let's do it!
Great! I'll text you the details
